name: LouseborneRelapsingFeverTestsForBorreliaSpeciesInBlood
title: Louseborne relapsing fever (Tests for Borrelia species in Blood)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Borrelia species in blood by any method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Borrelia species tests in blood),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
